summary: A meeting in a London bus with jewel thief Lady Christina takes a turn for the worst for the Doctor when the bus takes a detour to a desert-like planet, where the deadly Swarm awaits.
cast: David Tennant|Michelle Ryan|Lee Evans|Noma Dumezweni|Adam James|Glenn Doherty|Victoria Alcock|David Ames|Ellen Thomas|Reginald Tsiboe|Daniel Kaluuya|Keith Parry|James Layton|Paul Kasey|Ruari Mears|Marcus Elliot|Barbara Fadden|Ian Hilditch|Claudio Laurini
title: Planet of the Dead
